name: Olaf Zimniak
story: Olaf comes from a small town in Poland. He joined the military to escape poverty and gain a new perspective on life. He is a skilled looter and has managed to survive the chaos of war by keeping a low profile and staying out of trouble. Despite his rough exterior, Olaf is a compassionate person who cares deeply about his fellow soldiers and the plight of innocent civilians caught in the middle of the conflict.
